document.full_text: bahrain's main opposition groups eased conditions for talks to end a crisis that has drawn in neighboring armies, though tensions in the oil-exporting region remained high as bahrain expelled an iranian diplomat.
document.title: bahrain's main opposition group eases demands
lines_and_colors: bahrain's main opposition groups eased conditions for talks to end a crisis that has drawn in neighboring armies, though tensions in the oil-exporting region remained high as bahrain expelled an iranian diplomat.
